reviews.text:
Originally signed up with Lowe’s to install new carpet in both of my bedrooms. Moved all of my furniture out of both rooms ahead of the day of installation only for Lowe’s to not have the product in stock and make no effort to fix the situation. I was looking at potentially weeks before a resolution.

Enter Carpet Depot. I spoke with Suzette, who was wonderful. In a span of 5 hours, Suzette was able to find product matching my specifications AND was able to schedule same day installation. You just don’t get that kind of customer service or turnaround time from the big box stores. Would highly recommend, especially if you’re working with Suzette.

I purchased carpet from Carpet Depot’s Decatur location for my man-cave project. Suzette Elder was as my salesperson and she took excellent care of me. Patiently answered all my questions and helped me make the perfect selection for needs. The installation process was flawless and professionally done. I would recommend Carpet Depot Decatur to anyone in the market for quality carpet at a competitive price.

Thank you very much Anna! You have been a blessing to our family from the very beginning. Your warm heart and kind spirit has made our purchase with Carpet Depot a pleasure!!🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾🥰🥰🥰🥰 great selection, great prices with a WONDERFUL staff!!!!

The lady who assisted us was so patient and so informative. She was so happy to help and actually gave wonderful suggestions. Honestly I was scared because we initially were looking for an area rug and I happened to figure out that their catalog consists of actual carpet material. I was scared thinking the material would be off putting in our living room area but it actually looks so homey and comfortable. The price was beyond affordable compared to ordering an actual area rug or even going to buy one. I enjoyed this experience so much and certainly will be back should I need any further assistance! Thank you Carpet Depot!

Carpet Depot and Suzette set the bar in flooring, customer service and prices that are so reasonable I didn't have to haggle AT ALL. It's rare these days not to walk away from big transactions where you don't feel like you have overpaid or been screwed over somehow. My experience with this business has offered nothing but reason after reason to give my future business to them. Thanks Suzette and Carpet Depot!
